# Lines starting with # are comments
# The variables for rebates and refunds contribute negatively to the total sums
# It's not straightforward to include them, since they need to be handled differently from all the others variables
# Since they are small we neglect them in this step (However, they might be re-introduced later)
# They are removed from this table by turning them into comments
